title: Frieze, 1890–1900
medium: Block-printed, flocked, mica flakes on embossed paper
description: b) Three vertical stripes to be cut into three friezes. Field tobacco brown flock. Design leaf scroll in metallic gold with flock black outlines in parts. Both edges of each stripe have metallic gold and black bands. Design embossed; a) Same design on darker brown flock field, design in metallic copper bronze and gold mica used in small medallions on borders and dark red flock outlines around leaf design. This piece has been cut into one stripe. Design embossed.

tombstone.epitaph: Frieze, 1890–1900. Block-printed, flocked, mica flakes on embossed paper. Gift of Robina Clark. 1939-33-53-a,b.
